short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop and save ingredients from any recipe website on the internet, checkout with top grocery services

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover and save your favorite recipes effortlessly with our Chrome extension!

Meet Sizzle – capture recipe pages or upload screenshots, seamlessly add ingredients to your cart, and checkout with Amazon Fresh or Whole Foods. 🛒 Recipes and shopping lists all in one place.

Cooking just got easier! 🥘✨ 

Sizzle lets you save your favorite recipes and ingredients with just one click. No more juggling multiple tabs or forgetting ingredients – everything you need is in one spot.

🔍 Find and save recipes
📸 Capture screenshots of recipes
🛒 Add ingredients to your cart
🛍️ Checkout with Amazon Fresh or Whole Foods

Plus, Sizzle integrates with the tools you already use to make meal planning as smooth as possible. 🚀 

Join Sizzle today and transform your cooking experience!
